questions.question: Explore the conversion flow to identify which traffic entry and financial product pair has the most unexpected volume, then investigate whether this pattern holds when filtering for higher transaction sizes.

key_insights: Alipay/WeChat Entry’s high volume across most products aligns with expectations, but its dominance in Payment is less pronounced than in Consumer Credit.
The unexpected link between Enterprise Payroll and Credit Card Installment becomes even more distinct when focusing on higher-value transactions.

reasoning.reasoning: The first step of highlighting all flows helps spot counterintuitive patterns by comparing actual volumes against typical industry assumptions.
This multi-step approach balances exploratory discovery with targeted validation
